src:
Istorijski dan za grad Berlin
Prvi put snage u Bundesligi odmeravaju Union i Herta

02 Nov 2019

Do 1989. godine postojao je zid koji je delio Berlin. Uprkos svim poteškoćama, Štazija i bodljikavih žica, pristalice Uniona i Herte gajili su prijateljske odnose. Međutim, u godinama posle pada Berlinskog zida, poštovanje među navijačima dva gradska kluba lagano je iščezavalo. Toliko da se grad podelio na crveni i plavi deo. Međutim, u poslednje tri decenije prestonica Nemačke nije imala mnogo prilike da upriliči dvoboje Uniona i Herte. Samo četiri meča između Gvozdenih i Stare dame. Malo, premalo...
Subota, 2. novembar, biće istorijski dan za grad Berlin. Tog dana ostvariće se san generacija fudbalskih zaljubljenika da ponovo dobiju gradski derbi u elitnom rangu nemačkog fudbala, a posle godina čekanja Union i Herta ukrstiće koplja u okviru 10. kola Bundeslige i odlučiti ko je glavni tim u prelepom i modernom gradu u zemlji pancera. Biće to odličan duel koji će obeležiti dobra atmosfera malog stadiona Uniona za 22.000 duša.
Stadion „u kući starog šumara“, kako mu je ime, već je ove sezone uspevao da iznenadi ozbiljna imena poput Borusije iz Dortmunda koju su Gvozdeni tukli sa 3:1, pa domaćini s velikim očekivanjima dočekuju ovaj derbi. Ni jednima ni drugima ne ide u poslednje vreme, mada je Herta nešto bolje pozicionirana na tabeli gde ima četiri boda više. Union Berlin ima po pobedu i remi uz pet poraza na poslednjih sedam utakmica, dok je Stara dama porazom od Hofenhajma prošlog vikenda prekinula niz od četiri utakmica bez poraza (tri pobede i remi).
Dosad su se sastajali samo u Cvajti, dva puta je pobeđivao gost i dva puta je bilo nerešeno, a sva četiri meča okončana su golom na obe strane. Srpski internacionalci Neven Subotić i Marko Grujić nezamenjivi su šrafovi u svojim klubovima i očekuju se u startnih 11.

BUNDESLIGA - 10. kolo

PetakHofenhajm - Paderborn 3:0 (3:0)/Skov 2, Kaderžabek 15, Lokadija 25/

Nedelja15.30: (2,70) Fortuna Diseldorf (3,30) Keln (2,60)18.00: (3,90) Augzburg (3,50) Šalke (1,95)

text:
Historic day for the city of Berlin
For the first time, the Bundesliga forces weigh down Union and Herta

02 Nov 2019

By 1989, there was a wall dividing Berlin. Despite all the difficulties, Stasius and barbed wire, supporters of Union and Herte cultivated friendly relations. However, in the years following the fall of the Berlin Wall, the respect among the fans of the two city clubs was slowly disappearing. So much so that the city was divided into red and blue. However, in the last three decades, the German capital has not had much opportunity to host duels of Union and Hertha. Only four matches between the Irons and the Old Lady. Little, little ...
Saturday, November 2, will be a historic day for the city of Berlin. That day, the dream of generations of football fans will come true to win the city derby again in the elite rankings of German football, and after years of waiting Union and Herta will cross the spear within the 10th round of the Bundesliga and decide who is the main team in the beautiful and modern city in the country of Panzer. It will be a great duel that will mark the good atmosphere of a small Union Stadium for 22,000 souls.
The stadium "in the house of the old forester", as he is named, has already managed to surprise with serious names this season, such as Borussia Dortmund beaten by the Irons 3-1, so the hosts are looking forward to this derby. Neither of them has been going lately, though Herta is slightly better placed on the table with four points higher. Union Berlin have wins and draws with five losses in their last seven games, while the Old Lady defeated Hoffenheim last weekend to break four straight games without defeat (three wins and draws).
So far, they have only met in Zweite, twice have won a guest and twice have been a draw, and all four matches ended with a goal on both sides. Serbian internationals Neven Subotic and Marko Grujic are irreplaceable screws in their respective clubs and are expected in the starting 11.

BUNDESLIGA - Round 10

FridayHoffenheim - Paderborn 3-0 (3-0) / Skov 2, Kaderzabek 15, Lokadia 25 /
